sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都表示"揭露，暴露"之意。
means: disclose ： 侧重指揭露或泄露鲜为人知或保密的事。
expose ： 多指揭露丑闻、坏人坏事或各种阴谋。也可指某物暴露在外。
uncover ： 主要指移去遮盖物，让东西显露出来。也可指揭露阴谋、秘密等。
reveal ： 多指揭露一直隐藏或隐秘的东西，或启示超乎常人领导能力的真理。

sentence.Network_en: They contend that the company failed to disclose material information.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们坚持认为该公司并未透露实质性的信息。

sentence.Network_en: I am afraid we are not at liberty to disclose that information.
sentence.Network_cn: 恐怕我们无权透露这一信息。

sentence.Network_en: The spokesman refused to disclose details of the takeover to the press.
sentence.Network_cn: 发言人拒绝向新闻界透露公司收购的详细情况。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 星火英语四级词汇表·巧记·速记·精练 - 豆丁网 ... closet n. 贮藏室 disclose vt. 揭露 enclose vt. 围住;随函附上.
大学英语四级单词集锦 D 开头_百度文库 ... discipline n. 纪律；训练 disclose vt. 揭开，揭发；透露 discourage vt. 使泄气，使灰心.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... closet n 壁橱；秘室 disclose v 揭发；泄露 enclose v 包围，围绕.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... closet n 壁橱；秘室 disclose v 揭发；泄露 enclose v 包围，围绕.

list.abs: 政治选举常用词汇 ... 改选 re-election 记名投票 disclosed ballot 决定性票 decisive vote.
会计词汇E ... disclaimer of property 放弃财产 discloseable transaction 须予披露的交易 disclosure of interest 披露权益.
discission needle 晶状体刺开针，载囊针disclosing solution 显示波disc memory 盘式存储器
证券经纪人 securities broker披露制度 disclosing system交割日 closing date

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French desclos-, stem of desclore, based on Latin claudere 'to close'

entry.def: If you disclose new or secret information, you tell people about it.

example.ex: Neither side would disclose details of the transaction...
example.tran: 双方均不肯披露交易细节。

example.ex: The company disclosed that he will retire in May.
example.tran: 公司透露他将在5月退休。

means.word_mean: 1. make known to the public information that was previously known only to a few people or that was meant to be kept a secret;

sentences.sentence: "The auction house would not disclose the price at which the van Gogh had sold"
"The actress won't reveal how old she is"

means.word_mean: 2. disclose to view as by removing a cover;

sentences.sentence: "The curtain rose to disclose a stunning set"

auth_sentence.content: The company wouldn't disclose the total job cuts.
auth_sentence.res_content: The company wouldn't disclose the total job cuts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The company wouldn't disclose the total job cuts.

auth_sentence.content: He did not disclose the nature of the offence.
auth_sentence.res_content: He did not disclose the nature of the offence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He did not disclose the nature of the offence.

auth_sentence.content: He did not disclose the name of the supplier.
auth_sentence.res_content: He did not disclose the name of the supplier.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He did not disclose the name of the supplier.

stems_affixes.word_buile: clos关闭+et小东西→关的小东西→壁橱
dis分开,打开+clos关闭+e→把关的打开→揭发
en进入+clos关闭+e→被关起来→包围

sentences.en: He disclosed his views about this thing.
sentences.cn: 他表明了对这事的看法。

sentences.en: He disclosed the box to us.

jushi.english: He disclosed his views about this thing.
jushi.chinese: 他表明了他对这事的看法。

jushi.english: He refused to disclose his address to us.
jushi.chinese: 他拒绝告诉我们他的地址。
